name: Januar
short: EU EMI supporting crypto businesses with SEPA/SWIFT rails.
description: Januar is an EU-based EMI that supports crypto-related companies with reliable SEPA and SWIFT infrastructure. Suitable for OTC, VASP/CASP entities with proper AML/KYC.
fees: Depends on volume and risk profile

name: Nordark
description: Nordark provides accounts and payment rails for crypto businesses, supporting SEPA and SWIFT. Works with OTC/P2P models on a case-by-case basis.

name: Clear Junction
short: UK EMI offering payments and banking for crypto firms.
description: Clear Junction is a UK EMI supporting crypto companies, including VASP/CASP, with SEPA, SWIFT, and Faster Payments. Strong compliance requirements.
